description: Armor (Hisako Ichiki (市来 久子, Ichiki Hisako)) is a fictional character who exists in Marvel Comics' shared universe, the Marvel Universe. She is a Japanese mutant who enrolled at the Xavier Institute as a teenager and who retained her powers after the events of Decimation.  She first appeared in Astonishing X-Men, vol. 3 #4.
name: Armor (Hisako Ichiki)
powers: Ability to generate an impenetrable psionic exoskeleton body armor that grants superhuman strength
